name: Treasure Defence
description:
This is a VR only game. It is using OpenXR which means it is playable on PC with any standardized headset.

To install the game, download the zip, extract it and run the game executable.

Install guide for Oculus Quest 1/2:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lFTXv2aScJ8&ab_channel=SideQuestVR

If its successful you can now open  Unknown Sources in the apps and run Treasure Defence.
